alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 7:57AM CDT until June 07 at 10:20AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Fall River at Fredonia affecting Wilson County. For the Fall River...including Fredonia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fall River at Fredonia. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fall River Fredonia 17.0 18.6 Mon 7 am CDT 13.8 13.1 12.6 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
